verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> toward <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H5197>drop<s%> thy word toward the holy <S%H4720>places<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

And <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Behold, I am against thee, and will draw <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> out of his <S%H8593>sheath<s%>, and will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from thee the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.

<S%H3282>Seeing<s%> then that I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from thee the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, therefore shall my <S%H2719>sword<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of his <S%H8593>sheath<s%> against all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> from the <S%H5045>south<s%> to the <S%H6828>north<s%>:

That all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have drawn <S%H3318>forth<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> out of his <S%H8593>sheath<s%>: it shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> any more.

<S%H584>Sigh<s%> therefore, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, with the <S%H7670>breaking<s%> of thy <S%H4975>loins<s%>; and with <S%H4814>bitterness<s%> <S%H584>sigh<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And it shall be, when they <S%H559>say<s%> unto thee, Wherefore <S%H584>sighest<s%> thou? that thou shalt <S%H559>answer<s%>, For the <S%H8052>tidings<s%>; because it <S%H935>cometh<s%>: and every <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H4549>melt<s%>, and all <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be <S%H7503>feeble<s%>, and every <S%H7307>spirit<s%> shall <S%H3543>faint<s%>, and all <S%H1290>knees<s%> shall be <S%H3212>weak<s%> as <S%H4325>water<s%>: behold, it <S%H935>cometh<s%>, and shall be brought to <S%H1961>pass<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
¶ Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; <S%H559>Say<s%>, A <S%H2719>sword<s%>, a <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H2300>sharpened<s%>, and also <S%H4803>furbished<s%>:

It is <S%H2300>sharpened<s%> to make a <S%H2874>sore<s%> <S%H2873>slaughter<s%>; it is <S%H4178>furbished<s%> that it may <S%H1300>glitter<s%>: <S%H176>should<s%> we then make <S%H7797>mirth<s%>? it <S%H3988>contemneth<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of my <S%H1121>son<s%>, as every <S%H6086>tree<s%>.

And he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> it to be <S%H4803>furbished<s%>, that it may be <S%H3709%H8610>handled<s%>: this <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H2300>sharpened<s%>, and it is <S%H4178>furbished<s%>, to <S%H5414>give<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2026>slayer<s%>.

<S%H2199>Cry<s%> and <S%H3213>howl<s%>, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>: for it shall be upon my <S%H5971>people<s%>, it shall be upon all the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H4048>terrors<s%> by reason <S%H413>of<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall be upon my <S%H5971>people<s%>: <S%H5606>smite<s%> therefore upon thy <S%H3409>thigh<s%>.
Because it is a <S%H974>trial<s%>, and what if the sword <S%H3988>contemn<s%> even the <S%H7626>rod<s%>? it shall be no more, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

Thou therefore, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, and <S%H5221>smite<s%> thine <S%H3709%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H5221>together<s%>, and let the <S%H2719>sword<s%> be <S%H3717>doubled<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> time, the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain<s%>: it is the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> men that are <S%H2491>slain<s%>, which entereth into their privy <S%H2314>chambers<s%>.

I have <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H19>point<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> against all their <S%H8179>gates<s%>, that their <S%H3820>heart<s%> may <S%H4127>faint<s%>, and their <S%H4383>ruins<s%> be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%>: <S%H253>ah<s%>! it is <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1300>bright<s%>, it is wrapped <S%H4593>up<s%> for the <S%H2874>slaughter<s%>.
Go thee one way or <S%H258>other<s%>, either <S%H7760>on<s%> the right <S%H3231>hand<s%>, or on the <S%H8041>left<s%>, <S%H575>whithersoever<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H3259>set<s%>.
I will also <S%H5221>smite<s%> mine <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H3709>together<s%>, and I will cause my <S%H2534>fury<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%>: I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>said<s%> it.
¶ The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me again, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Also, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>appoint<s%> thee <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>, that the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> may <S%H935>come<s%>: both <S%H8147>twain<s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>: and <S%H1254>choose<s%> thou a <S%H3027>place<s%>, <S%H1254>choose<s%> it at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

<S%H7760>Appoint<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%>, that the <S%H2719>sword<s%> may <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7237>Rabbath<s%> of the <S%H1121%H5983>Ammonites<s%>, and to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%H1219>defenced<s%>.

For the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H517>parting<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%>, at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>, to <S%H7080>use<s%> <S%H7081>divination<s%>: he made his <S%H2671>arrows<s%> <S%H7043>bright<s%>, he <S%H7592>consulted<s%> with <S%H8655>images<s%>, he <S%H7200>looked<s%> in the <S%H3516>liver<s%>.

At his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> was the <S%H7081>divination<s%> for <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, to <S%H7760>appoint<s%> <S%H3733>captains<s%>, to <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H7524>slaughter<s%>, to lift <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting<s%>, to <S%H7760>appoint<s%> battering <S%H3733>rams<s%> against the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, to <S%H8210>cast<s%> a <S%H5550>mount<s%>, and to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1785>fort<s%>.

And it shall be unto them as a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7080>divination<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>, to them that have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H7621>oaths<s%>: but he will call to <S%H2142>remembrance<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, that they may be <S%H8610>taken<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because ye have made your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to be <S%H2142>remembered<s%>, in that your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H1540>discovered<s%>, so that in all your <S%H5949>doings<s%> your <S%H2403>sins<s%> do <S%H7200>appear<s%>; because, I say, that ye are come to <S%H2142>remembrance<s%>, ye shall be <S%H8610>taken<s%> with the <S%H3709>hand<s%>.

¶ And thou, <S%H2491>profane<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whose <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H6256>when<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall have an <S%H7093>end<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; <S%H5493>Remove<s%> the <S%H4701>diadem<s%>, and take <S%H7311>off<s%> the <S%H5850>crown<s%>: this shall not be the <S%H2063>same<s%>: <S%H1361>exalt<s%> him that is <S%H8217>low<s%>, and <S%H8213>abase<s%> him that is <S%H1364>high<s%>.

I will <S%H5754>overturn<s%>, <S%H5754>overturn<s%>, <S%H5754>overturn<s%>, it: and it shall <S%H7760>be<s%> no more, until he <S%H935>come<s%> whose <S%H4941>right<s%> it is; and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it him.

¶ And thou, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> concerning the <S%H1121%H5983>Ammonites<s%>, and concerning their <S%H2781>reproach<s%>; even <S%H559>say<s%> thou, The <S%H2719>sword<s%>, the <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H6605>drawn<s%>: for the <S%H2874>slaughter<s%> it is <S%H4803>furbished<s%>, to <S%H398>consume<s%> because of the <S%H1300>glittering<s%>:

Whiles they <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%> unto thee, whiles they <S%H7080>divine<s%> a <S%H3577>lie<s%> unto thee, to <S%H5414>bring<s%> thee upon the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of them that are <S%H2491>slain<s%>, of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, whose <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H6256>when<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall have an <S%H7093>end<s%>.

Shall I cause it to <S%H7725>return<s%> into his <S%H8593>sheath<s%>? I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> thee in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where thou wast <S%H1254>created<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of thy <S%H4351>nativity<s%>.

And I will pour <S%H8210>out<s%> mine <S%H2195>indignation<s%> upon thee, I will <S%H6315>blow<s%> against thee in the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath<s%>, and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> thee into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1197>brutish<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H2796>skilful<s%> to <S%H4889>destroy<s%>.

Thou shalt be for <S%H402>fuel<s%> to the <S%H784>fire<s%>; thy <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>; thou shalt be no more <S%H2142>remembered<s%>: for I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.
